Parental benefit, lump-sum grant and pregnancy benefit
route.hva-soker-du: What do you want to apply for
informasjonstavle.tittel: Parental benefit, lump-sum grant and pregnancy benefit
informasjonstavle.ingress: These are your rights when expecting children or awaiting parental benefits.
informasjonstavle.hva_kan_du_få_ingress: Use the wizard to find out whether you should apply for the parental benefit or lump-sum grant.
informasjonstavle.hvor_mye_ingress: Calculate the parental benefit you are entitled to.
informasjonstavle.hvor_lenge_ingress: Plan how long you can stay home with the child.
informasjonstavle.velg_søknadsskjema.ing: Both mother, father and co-mother use the same form to apply for parental benefit or to make changes. Here you will also find a form for applying lump-sum grant and pregnancy allowance.
informasjonstavle.mer_informasjon.foreld: The parental benefit shall replace your income when you are at home with the child in connection with birth or adoption.
informasjonstavle.mer_informasjon.engang: If you are expecting a child and have not had an income in the past year, you can receive a lump-sum instead of the parental benefit.
informasjonstavle.mer_informasjon.svange: Pregnancy benefit is granted to healthy women who cannot work during pregnancy because it may harm the unborn baby.
informasjonstavle.andre_lenker.hvis_en_a: If one of you gets sick
tjenester.lenke_beregning: Calculate how much you are entitled to
tjenester.lenke_planlegger: Plan for how long you can be at home with your child

om_foreldrepenger.hvor_lenge.fordeling.k: Can not be taken over by {subjekt}
The same rules apply to adoption
om_foreldrepenger.hvor_lenge.fordeling.t: In addition to the maternal quota, the mother also gets the last three weeks before the estimated date of delivery
om_foreldrepenger.hvor_lenge.fordeling.i: In addition to parental benefit, the mother also gets the last three weeks before the estimated date of delivery

om_foreldrepenger.nye_regler_label: The child is born or adopted
om_foreldrepenger.nye_regler.før_beskriv: 10 weeks of the total parental benefit period is allocated to each of the parents (quota). If you have more than one child at the same time, you will receive five or seven extra weeks for each child after the first one.
om_foreldrepenger.nye_regler.etter_beskr: 15 weeks of the total parental benefit period is allocated to each of the parents (quota). If you have two children at the same time, you will receive 17 or 21 extra weeks. If you have three or more children, you will receive 46 or 56 extra weeks.
om_foreldrepenger.nye_beregningsregler.h: New rules for calculating the parental benefit from 1 January 2019.
